properties.name: Palo Alto
properties.desc: Palo Alto is my hometown. I attended Foothill College and worked for SAIC, OpenPlans, San Francisco Muni, and the First United Methodist Church of Palo Alto.

properties.name: Santa Barbara
properties.desc: I received my BA in Geography from UCSB in June 2014. I also worked for the Campus Learning Assistance Services Writing Lab as a writing tutor.

properties.name: Chicago
properties.desc: During the summer of 2014, I was a fellow in the Data Science for Social Good program at the University of Chicago.

properties.name: Washington, DC
properties.desc: I live in Washington, DC and work at Conveyal.
